altername_name: A Week in the life of the Thing!
name: Thing!
overview: The Thing has been hired by the AHC to deliver the Ball to the Dingalinger Overlord. For several months tension amongst the Dingalingers has been growing, negotiations have been broken down and the planet is on the brink of nuclear war. This mission will not be easy, for a start the Dingalinger Overlord has hidden himself away and is refusing to meet the Ball until the Thing has completed 10 difficult tasks. Gangs of Dingalingers roam the planets surface and will nottakekindly to an alien Thing trespassing on their property. Once the tasks are completed the Overlord will reveal himself on one of the planets 26 sub-levels, to move around these districts you must use one of the many 'TELEPHONEX' teleport booths.
